message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9000. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $8500 for the product. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8700. It's still a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'd be willing to pay $8500 for the product, as I mentioned before. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
